item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: June 19, 2023 Today's Verse Proverbs 22:4 [4] The reward for humility and fear of the LORD is riches and honor and life. Today's Memory Verse James 1:22 - But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves. John 14:6 - Jesus said to him, â€œI am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
